title: Term paper in LATEX (specifications of the HM)
requirements:
Please fill in all fields marked with *.
Forbidden characters (e.g. emojis) will result in an incorrect result.

alert.heading: Notice
alert.body: The result of this form is for testing purposes only and is not always up to date. For productive scientific work, the LATEX-template on GitHub should be used.

form.pdfwarn: If you specify "No", your entered data will be forwarded to latexonline.cc.
form.title: Title of work
form.author: Author
